title: I have a refurbished Pixel 2. I would like to know what are 2 openings on the front for?
content:
I am having fun with my refurbished Pixel 2 (not 2XL). Great Phone. But I am curious about the 2 front slots on the front of the device. Can someone please tell me what they're function is? I would be most grateful for a reply!
Thanks for your assistance!
